text: The Station Building of Manshuiwan. Manshuiwan railway station(漫水湾站) is a railway station on Chengkun railway, China. The station is located in Mianning County, Sichuan province, initially built in 1970, managed by the Xichang branch of Chengdu Railway Bureau. It has a dedicated railway to Xichang Satellite Launch Center. Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1970 Category:Railway stations in Sichuan
title: Manshuiwan railway station
